El deseo mas grande de el es terminar su casa lo mas pronto posible para llevar a su familia a su nuevo hogar que será propio. Para realizar su anhelo el necesita capital para comprar material y pagar mano de obra.
texts.en: Mr. José Efraín started to build his home which will be the inheritance that he will leave for his two children.  He has been building his house little by little using the savings that he had accumulated through many years. He, his wife and their two children have been living in a rented house for the last five years, the time that it has taken him to finish his project.  His biggest wish is to finish his house as soon as possible and be able to to take his family to their own home.  To reach his goal he needs capital to buy materials and pay the laborers.

loans.use: to complete the construction on his home.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy pasta, sauces, rice, beans and oil

loans.name: Braulio

texts.es: El señor Braulio dedicado al servicio de transporte durante  varios años atrás gracias al sacrificio que realizo durante ese tiempo pudo comprarse su propio vehículo con el cual actualmente se encuentra trabajando y sosteniendo a su familia  con los ingresos que genera. El crédito que solicita el cliente es para comprar repuestos para su movilidad ya que presento algunos desperfectos. Pero una vez subsanados los daños de su vehículo se pondrá a trabajar nuevamente desde muy temprano hasta altas horas de la noche para así reunir dinero para comprarse otro vehículo y así poder tener mas ingresos, esta muy agradecido con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en:
Braulio has been providing a transport service for several years.  Thanks to his hard work, he was able to buy his own vehicle which he currently uses for his work.  He supports his family with the income that he makes.

Braulio is requesting a loan to buy spare parts for his vehicle since it is experiencing some problems.  Once the problems with his vehicle have been repaired he will start working again from very early in the morning until very late at night in order to make money to buy another vehicle so that he can make more income.  He is very grateful to the institution for the support they have given him.

loans.use: to buy spare parts for his vehicle

loans.name: San Martin Patria Nueva Group

texts.es:
Este grupos se llama San Martín Patria Nueva sus integrantes le pusieron así ya que ellas son muy devotas a este santo San Martín D. Porres y Patria Nueva porque así se llama L. población donD. habitan estas integrantes. Este grupo esta conformada por 4 mujeres muy trabajadoras y responsables que se dedican a diferentes actividades para obtener dinero y así solventar los gastos D. su familia. Las personas que integran este grupo son las siguientes: María se dedica a L. elaboración D. totopos y tortillas, Araceli se dedica a L. venta D. dulces, Hilda se dedica  a L. venta D. ropa y colchas y Emiliana se dedica a L. cosecha D. cacahuates.
Araceli Martínez es L. representante D. este grupo es soltera elL. solicito el préstamo para comprar dulces como son: paletas, chicles, bombones, pulpas D. tamarindo entre otros, elL. tiene un pequeño negocio en el que venD. una variedad D. dulces para así obtener un poco D. ganancia para solventar sus gastos y para ayudar a su mama con algunos gastos D. L. casa ya que a su mama no le alcanza el dinero y como tiene hermanos pequeños  hay ocasiones en que el dinero no alcanza es por ello que elL. ayuda a su mama. Su sueño D. elL. es tener una profesión para así tener más oportunidades en L. vida y apoyar más a sus padres.
texts.en:
This group is called "San Martín Patria Nueva." Its members gave it this name because they are very devoted to this saint, San Martín D. Porres, and because Patria Nueva ["New Homeland"] is the name of the settlement where these members live. The group is maD. up of 4 very hard-working and responsible women who pursue different lines of work to earn money and cover the expenses of their families. The people who make up this group are the following: María, who makes totopos and tortillas; Araceli, who sells sweets; Hilda, who sells clothing and quilts; and Emiliana, who works harvesting peanuts. 

Araceli Martínez is the representative of this group. She is single, and she is requesting the loan to buy sweets such as lollipops, gum, candies, and tamarind pulp, among others. She has a small business where she sells a variety of sweets, so she can earn a little money to cover her expenses and to help her mother with some household expenses, since her mother's funds are not sufficient, and she has young siblings. There are times when there is not enough money, and because of this, she helps her mother. Araceli's dream is to have a profession so that she can have more opportunities in life and help her parents more.

loans.use: to buy products to sell such as lollipops, gum, chewy candies and hard candies.

loans.name: Yolanda

texts.es:
La señora Yolanda es una mujer muy responsable todas la mañanas de Lunes a Sábado y algunas veces Domingos sale a su lugar de trabajo que es una ferretería para comenzar su labores diarias, lo que ella hace es andar por las calles a pesar de las inclemencias del tiempo visitar clientes para cobrar. Su trabajo es cansado más que todo por que su única fuente de transporte es su bicicleta para moverse de un lado a otro. 
A  Yolanda le encanta realizar esta actividad ya que de esta manera lleva ingresos para sostener a su hijo, pero ese no es su problema sino el que tienen es que a su casa, el techo de madera se le esta deteriorando por lo que necesita capital para poderlo arreglar y así ofrecer a su hijo una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Mrs. Yolanda is a very responsible woman.  Every morning, Monday to Saturday and sometimes Sunday, she goes to her work place, which is a hardware store, to do her daily work.  She goes door to door, in spite of at times inclement weather, seeing customers to collect on their accounts.  Her work is very tiring especially since her only transportation is a bicycle.  Yolanda loves doing this work because in this way she can make money to support her son.  Work is not her problem, however what is disturbing her is that the wood roof on her house is deteriorating and she needs money to fix it,  this way providing her son a better quality of life.

loans.use: to repair the roof of her house.

loans.name: Nanci Paola

texts.es:
Para Nanci Paola F. M., el trascurrir de los días la vida  le brinda nuevas oportunidades para mejorar su negocio ya que actualmente tiene un nuevo punto de venta donde es  muy concurrido, ya que es carretera principal al mercado,   ahora la  prioridad para ella es  llenar cada espacio de su nuevo local,  y poder aprovechar ese recurso,  pero esto implica más inversión en  capital por lo que ella solicita un nuevo crédito,  ella sabe que con una buena atención y disposición a sus clientes ella puede salir avante diariamente, también ha incluido nuevos productos en su negocio, como la venta de carteras, bolsos, cinchos, artículos para dama, y diversidad de calzado.solicita este credito para la compra de zapatos,bolsas para dama,cinchos etc.
Su anhelo es seguir aumentado su capital invertido, seguir vendiendo y seguirse manteniendo en el mercado a pesar de las mucha competencia que la rodea, ya que es para ella un patrimonio para sus hijos, como también una actividad productiva que pueda servirles en un futuro, lo que también la hace sentirse una mujer productiva y no dependiente de los demás lo cual la hace sentirse orgullosa
texts.en:
For Nanci Paola F. M., the past few days of life have brought her new opportunities to improve her business. She currently has a new sales outlet that is very busy. It is located at the market along the main highway. Now her priority is to fill each space of her new shop and take advantage of what she has. However, she needs to invest in more capital, which is why she is requesting this new loan. Nanci knows that good service and attention to her customers will help her get ahead each day. She also wants to introduce new products to her business such as wallets, handbags, belts, women’s accessories, and a variety of footwear. Nanci is requesting this loan in order to buy shoes, women’s purses, belts, and other items.

Her wish is to continue increasing her investment capital so that she can maintain her shop despite the amount of local competition. This business serves as an inheritance for her children as well as a productive activity that can give them a future. Nanci believes she is a productive woman who does not have to depend on others, an accomplishment of which she is proud.

loans.use: to purchase shoes, women’s purses, belts, and other items.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to improve her home.

loans.name: Maria Ester

texts.es:
María, reside en la ciudad de San Miguel, vive junto a su esposo y dos hijos de 12 y14 años de edad, Ella se dedica a la venta de Lociones y Cosméticos, este surge por iniciativa propia, hace 3 años, trabaja todos los días de la semana de 7:00am a 4:00pm, visita a los clientes en sus hogares, ofreciendo la mercadería.
Ella está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de lociones y cosméticos, ya que quiere abastecer el negocio de productos para los clientes, fortaleciendo el negocio para obtener mejores utilidades.
Su objetivo es mantenerse en el negocio, que este le provea a su familia lo necesario para su familia y sobre todo para la superación de sus hijos.
texts.en:
María resides in the city of San Miguel. She lives with her husband and two children who are 12 and 14 years of age. She sells Lotions and Cosmetics, a business she started three years ago by her own initiative. She works every day of the week from 7 a.m. to 4 p.m. visiting her customers in their homes to offer them merchandise. 

She is seeking a loan to purchase lotions and cosmetics since she wants to stock her business with products for her customers, improving business in order to bring in greater profits. 

Her objective is to maintain her business as this provides her family with necessities and, above all, helps her children overcome their circumstances.

loans.use: to purchase lotions and cosmetics.

loans.name: Rosa Del Cielo Group

texts.es:
En la comunidad de Rosa del Calvario está el grupo de que se llama Rosa del cielo, se llaman así por el nombre que tiene su comunidad que se encuentra en las faldas de un cerro grandisimo lleno de puros arboles, la gente vive muy humildemente, la representante del grupo "Rosa del Cielo" se llama Maria Guadalupe, ella se dedica a la cria y engorda de borregos, llevo ya muchos años con ésta actividad, ella nos dice: "desde que me acuerdo siempre le ayudaba a mis papás con sus animales, los llevaba a comer al pasto, les daba agua y los cuidaba para que no les pasara nada." 

En ésta comunidad es muy común la cría de animales, además son pocas las personas que tienen otra actividad y los habitantes del pueblo generalmente van al centro del pueblo a comprar las cosas que necesitan. 

"Yo pienso que el prestamo me va ayudar mucho porque voy a tener un negocio y en todo negocio hay ganancias para la familia, deseo que mi negocio produzca y pueda comprar mas animales" dice Maria Guadalupe; ella espera diversificar su negocio comprando diferentes animales, con las ganancias ella compra los alimentos para su familia y espera reinvertir en el negocio.
Maria Guadalupe se casó hace 9 años y tiene dos hijas que estudian la primaria, la casa donde vive es prestada.
El grupo lo integran 7 personas, todos los integrantes se dedican a criar borregos para comprar y vender.
texts.en:
The Rosa del Cielo [Rose of Heaven] group, takes its name from that of their community, Rosa del Calvario [Rose of Calvary], which is located at the foot of a great hill covered with forests, where the people live very modestly. The representative of the Rosa del Cielo group is named Maria Guadalupe and works to raise and fatten lambs. She has been doing this for many years and tells us "For as long as I can remember, I always helped my parents with their animals. I took them to graze in the pasture, gave them water, and cared for them so nothing would happen to them."

In this community it's very common to raise animals, and there are few people who do anything else. Everybody goes to the main town to buy things. 

She says "I think the loan is going to help me a lot because I'm going to have a business, and businesses bring money for the family. I want my business to make money so I can buy more animals." She hopes to diversify her business by buying different animals, and use the profits to feed my family and also continue investing in the business.

Maria Guadalupe married her husband nine years ago, and they have two daughters who study in primary school. They live in a rented house. 

The group is made up of 7 people, all of whom raise lambs to buy and sell.

loans.use: to purchase lambs to raise and sell.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: purchase clothing to sell in shop

loans.name: Griselda

texts.es:
La señora Griselda es una mujer dedicada al hogar ya que desde hace varios años fue pensionada. Es madre de 4 pequeños a los que quiere ofrecer una mejor calidad de vida. Hace poco el gobierno le otorgo una casa para que ella viviera junto con su esposo e hijos. 
Como la vivienda es de interés social por lo regular este tipo de casas son muy pequeñas y Griselda desea iniciar una construcción de un cuarto en la parte de enfrente para ampliar su sala comedor de esta manera ofrecerá a su familia mayor comodidad para esto necesita capital para comprar y pagar su proyecto.
texts.en: Sr. Griselda is a homemaker and for several years she has received a pension. She is mother to 4 little ones and wants to offer them a better quality of life. Recently the government granted her a house to live in with her husband and children. As a public housing grant, this type of house is generally very small. Griselda wants to start construction on a room in the front part of the house to enlarge her dining room and in this manner make her family more comfortable. For this she needs capital to pay for her project.

loans.use: to increase living space on the ground floor of her home

loans.name: Loma Buenavista Group

texts.es:
Este grupo se llama Loma Buenavista, los podemos encontrar en la comunidad de Rosa del Clavario, una comunidad chica y tambien alejada, se encuentra en las faldas de un cerro grande y con una vista hermosa para toda la comunidad. Las 9 personas que integran el grupo viven cerca uno del otro son vecinos y se conocen desde hace muchos años, una integrante del grupo nos cuenta su historia sobre el credito que pidio, ella se llama Maria Cristina y nos platica lo siguiente: *Tengo una pequeña tienda de abarrotes, no vendo mucho porqué la luz no me llega al negocio y cuando empieza a obscuerecer ya tengo que cerrar porque no se ve nada, tambien quiero meter una vitrina para comprar carnes frias como, jamon, salchichas, crema y queso, pero no lo puedo hacer porque no tengo luz, el prestamo me va ayudar mucho porque tendria mas ingresos y en lugar de bajar en mi negocio voy a subir, yo espero que la tienda siga adelante y tengamos mas de lo que tenemos ahora, por ahora no tenemos muchas ganancias pero pienso ir metiendo mas mercancia para vender mucho mejor, tengo una niña pequeña todavia no va a la escuela, tengo 2 años de casada y vivo en casa de mi suegra, mi esposo trabaja como empleado en la cabecera del municipio.*
Ella y los demás integrantes del grupo dan las gracias a FRAC y KIVA por brindarles su confianza y apoyo.
texts.en:
This group is called Loma Buenavista and it is located in Rosa del Clavario community.  This is a small, remote community which is located on the side of a large hill which affords a beautiful view over the whole community.

The nine members of this group live near one another.  They are neighbors and have known each other for many years.  One of the members of the group tells us her story about the loan that she has requested.  The lady's name is Maria Cristina and she tells us the following: "I own a small grocery store.  I don't sell much because my business doesn't have electricity and so when it starts to get dark I have to close because you can't see anything.  I would like to install a display case so that I can buy cold cuts such as ham and sausages, and also cream and cheese, but I can't because I don't have any electricity.  This loan will help me a lot because I will make more income and instead of going backwards in my business, I will move forwards.  I hope to move ahead with my store and I hope that we will earn more than we do right now.  Right now we don't make much profit but I am planning to gradually add more merchandise so that I can make better sales.  I have a young daughter who doesn't go to school yet.  I have been married for 2 years and I live in my mother-in-law's home.  My husband is an office worker in the town's administrative center".

Maria Cristina and the other members of her group would like to thank FRAC and KIVA for placing their trust in them and supporting them.

loans.use: to buy merchandise for her store such as soft drinks, cookies and cold cuts

loans.name: Maria Nelis

texts.es:
María, vive en Usulután, junto a su esposo y su hija de 12 años de edad, tienen casa propia, ella es comerciante de verduras y frutas, el negocio nació hace 8 años y trabaja con el apoyo de su esposo, transporta la venta en una carreta y recorre las calles de la ciudad ofreciendo los productos.
Actualmente solicita un préstamo para la compra de frutas y verduras (manzanas, peras, bananos; papas, zanahorias, tomates) para el negocio, esta inversión le ayudara a disponer de mercadería para ofrecer  a los clientes.
El objetivo de ella es tener mayor rentabilidad del negocio, ganar ingresos suficientes para mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
Maria lives with her husband and her 12-year-old daughter in the city of Usulutan. They live in a house of their own. 

Maria is a fruit and vegetable vendor -- it is a business that she started eight years ago. She works with the support of her husband, transporting the produce in a cart and offering it all around the city.  

Maria is currently seeking a loan to purchase fruit and vegetables (apples, pears, bananas, potatoes, carrots, tomatoes) for her business. This investment will ensure that she has a sufficient stock of goods to offer to her clients. Maria's goal is to increase the profitability of her business so that she could earn an income that would allow her to improve the quality of life for her family.

loans.use: to purchase fruit and vegetables (apples, pears, bananas; potatoes, carrots, tomatoes)

loans.name: Adofo Abelin

texts.es:
Adolfo Abelin es un joven muy responsable que quiere ofrecer a su madre una mejor calidad de vida. A pesar de los años que tiene es una persona madura por que ayuda a su mama con los gastos del hogar, en este momento  desea empezar una construcción en la planta alta para tener mayor comodidad. 
Adolfo trabaja por las tardes en un restaurante de comida donde prepara tacos al pastor y gringas en lugar muy conocido de la ciudad. Para terminar su proyecto y a ayudar a su madre el necesita comprar lo necesario para realizar la construcción.
texts.en:
Adolfo Abelin is a very responsible young man who wants to provide a better quality of life to his mother.  In spite of his age, he is a very mature person who helps his mother with the household expenses.  Currently he wants to start construction of a second floor in order to add more comfort to their life.
Adolfo works in a restaurant in the afternoons.  He makes tacos and gringas in a very well known place in the city.  To be able to finish his project and help his mother he needs to buy the necessary materials for the construction.

loans.use: to build a second story.

loans.name: Luz Maria

texts.es: Luz María es una mujer muy trabajadora que se dedica a la coordinación de vendedoras por catalogó actividad que realiza desde hace 6 años y su esposo como empleado de una maquiladora desde hace 9 de esta manera escomo obtienen ingresos para el sostén familiar. La señora tienen una vivienda que desde hace 8 años empezó a vivir ahí y donde ha visto crecer a su hijo, esta casa le trae muchos recuerdo ya que es el patrimonio que piensa dejar a su hijo cuando crezca. En este momento desea iniciar la construcción de un cuarto en planta alta para tener mayor comodidad para esto necesita comprar material y pagar mano de obra.
texts.en:
Luz María is a very hard-working woman whose job is coordinating women who make catalog sales.  She has been in this line of work for 6 years.  Her husband has worked in a cross-border assembly plant for 9 years.  In this way, they both make income to support their family.

Luz María owns her own home.  She has lived there for 8 years and it is where she has watched her son grow up.  This house has many memories for her and it is the asset that she would like to leave her son when he grows up.  Luz María would like to start building a room upstairs in her home so that her family can live more comfortably.  For this reason, she needs to buy materials and pay labor costs.

loans.use: to build upstairs in her home

loans.name: Emerita Alicia

texts.es:
Emérita, reside en Concepción Batres, departamento de Usulután, vive con su familia, es soltera, administra una tienda, se dedica desde muy joven al negocio, no tiene un horario fijo para atenderlo y su experiencia le ha ayudado a mantenerse en el negocio.
Ella necesita un préstamo para la compra de productos de consumo: jabón, detergentes, sal, azúcar, café, frijoles, aceite y muchos otros productos, esta compra le permitirá crecer y ampliar su inventario.
Los objetivos de Emérita son ampliarse en el comercio, ofrecer nuevos productos a los clientes, y trabajar por superarse.
texts.en:
Emérita resides in Concepción Batres, department of Usulután.  She lives with her family and is single. She has a store where she has worked from a very early age. She has no fixed hours of customer service and has been able to remain in business through the experience she gained. 

She needs a loan in order to purchase consumibles: soap, detergent, salt, sugar, coffee, beans, oil and many other products. This purchase will allow her to grow and expand her inventory. 

Emérita's objectives are to grow her business, offer new products to her customers, and work to get ahead.

loans.use: to purchase soap, detergents, salt, sugar, coffee, beans, and oil.

loans.name: Angel Deivi

texts.es: Ángel tiene 28 años de edad es casado y tiene un hijo de 5 años que esta en el colegio, el se dedica a vender golosinas y gaseosas en una carretilla ubicada al lado del hospital Félix Torrealba, su esposa también cuenta con otro negocio donde vende jugos y desayunos en la misma zona, inicio su negocio con el apoyo de sus suegros quienes también trabajan en dicha lugar tienen trabajando en esta actividad 5 años aproximadamente y esta ganando s/250 semanal, los desafíos que el enfrenta es que aun no cuenta con casa propia viven en casa de sus suegros, su sueño en el futuro es adquirir un terreno y construirlo para brindarle una mayor comodidad a sus familia, el dinero será invertido comprar mas mercadería, golosinas gaseosa chocolates  galletas pañales entre otras cosas y así abastecer su negocio para las fiestas de semana santa es una fecha tradicional en la ciudad de ICA , fecha en las que las ventas incrementan considerablemente, ángel esta muy contento con el apoyo que se le esta brindando.
texts.en:
Ángel is 28 years old, married, and has a child that is 5 and in school.  He dedicates himself to selling snacks and sodas from a cart located next to the Félix Torrealba hospital.  His wife also has another business selling juices and breakfasts in the same area.  He started his enterprise with the support of his in-laws, who also work in the same area.  He has been in business for 5 years, and earns 250 soles weekly.

The challenges he faces include not having his own house, therefore they live with their in-laws.  His dream for the future is to buy some land to build a house, so his family can live more comfortably.  The money will be invested into the purchase of merchandise such as snacks, sodas, chocolates, cookies and other items.  This will help him supply his business in anticipation of the Holy Week celebrations, a traditional time in the city of Ica when sales increase considerably.  Ángel is very happy for the support he is receiving.

loans.use: buy merchandise such as sodas, cookies, chocolates, and other items.

loans.name: La Merced (Cuenca) Group

texts.es:
El banco comunal La Merced está formado por 10 mujeres quienes trabajan en diferentes actividades como: comercio, cría de animales, agricultura, etc.  las mismas que les permiten aportar a la economía de sus hogares y sacar  adelante a sus familias. Viven por la parroquia de Santa Ana donde su gante es muy amable, gentil y trabajadora.  Esta parroquia es de clima frió y desde donde se puede admirar una parte de la ciudad de Cuenca y también  la naturaleza en todo su esplendor.

La Señora. Rosa Z. vive en la comunidad de Ingapirca que pertenece a la parroquia de Santa Ana.
 
Tiene 33 años, es casada y ha concebido 4 hijos de 16, 14, 12 y 10 años de edad, sus dos primeros hijos estudian en el colegio y sus dos últimos hijos en una escalita de la comunidad. Su esposo no se encuentra en el país ya que ha migrado en busca de un mejor trabajo y futuro para su familia. Con el trabajo conyugal han logrado  construir  su casa propia.

Doña Rosa trabaja en una ferretería que es de su propiedad, actividad que la realiza hace 2 años, trabaja de lunes a viernes de 7 de la mañana hasta las 6 de la tarde. También se dedica a la cría de chanchos, cuyes, pollos y ganado.

Se encuentra en su cuarto crédito que realiza del banco comunal y lo va a invertir en la compra de mercadería para en su ferretería como: cerraduras, clavos, herramientas, material eléctrico, pinturas, mangueras, etc.

Su meta es  construir un local comercial para poner su ferretería.
texts.en:
The community bank La Merced is comprised of 10 women who work in different activities such as trade, animal husbandry and agriculture, etc. that enable them to contribute to the support of their homes and development of their families. They live in the parish of Santa Ana where the people are very kind, gentle and hardworking. This parish is in a cold climate and it is where you can admire some of the city of Cuenca and surrounding nature in all its splendor.

Mrs. Rosa Z. lives in the community of Ingapirca that belongs to the parish of Santa Ana.  She is 33 years old, married and has 4 children, who are  16, 14, 12 and 10 years old.  Her first two children study at school and her two youngest children in the community schoolhouse. Her husband is not in the country, having migrated in search of better work and future for the family. Working together they have built their own home.

For the last two years, Rosa has worked in a hardware store that she owns.  She works Monday through Friday from 7 am to 6 pm. She is also involved in raising pigs, guinea pigs, chickens and cattle.

This is her fourth loan with the community bank and she will invest in buying merchandise for her hardware store such as locks, nails, tools, electrical equipment, paints, pipes, etc.

Her goal is to build a local center to put her hardware store.

loans.use: Buy merchandise like nails, locks, tools, paints, electrical equipment, pipes, etc.

loans.name: Rosa Etelvina

texts.es:
Rosa, reside en Usulután, se dedica a la venta de ropa al por mayor, vive en compañía de su madre y su hermano, tiene  casa propia, es soltera y cuenta con el apoyo de su madre para atender el negocio.
Ella necesita realizar una inversión en ropa nueva, para el negocio, por lo que solicita un préstamo e invertirlo en prendas de vestir de moda, cubriendo así la necesidad que como comerciante tiene, dando abasto a los pedidos de los clientes.
Su objetivo es recibir del negocio ganancias ya que a través de ellas ayuda a su madre y cubre todas las necesidades del hogar.
texts.en:
Rosa lives in Usulután, and she has a business selling clothing at wholesale.  She lives with her mother and her brother in her own home. She is single and relies on her mother for help with the business.

Rosa needs to make an investment in new clothing for her business.  For this reason, she requests a loan so that she can invest in fashionable clothing.  This way she can have a sufficient inventory for her business and be ready to fill her customer's orders.  

Her goal is to get earnings from her business, since with these earnings she helps her mother and covers the expenses for all of the household necessities.

loans.use: to buy clothing in different styles and colors

loans.name: Alegria Group

texts.es: El banco de emprendimiento Alegria  esta conformado por nueve personas 7 mujeres y 2 varones,  la mayoría de las señoras viven el zona Tembladerani, y se dedican a la artesanía de mantillas también un porcentaje son ambulantes que venden de feria en feria con productos de temporada  el cual se conocen muy bien en el grupo ya están en su tercer ciclo  también están los  varones que viven también el la misma zona. La presidenta se llama Janeth que tiene  su salón de belleza y también vende productos de belleza por catalogo y es muy exigente y cumplida por eso sus compañeras la eligieron presidenta, con el dinero del crédito comprara material para su salón de belleza como también Champo cremas para peinar, tintes, etc. y así de esta forma ofrecer mejor servicio  a sus clientas ya que es muy conocida por el buen trabajo que realiza y de esta manera incrementar sus ganancias, es una persona muy trabajadora agradecida con la institución por apoyo brindado.
texts.en:
The entrepreneurial bank "Alegría" is comprised of nine people, seven women and two men.  Most of the women live in the Tembladerani area and make artisan lace scarves for a living.  Some of them sell their work at fairs along with other seasonal products.  They know each other well and this is their third loan cycle.  The men also live in the area.

The president of the group is Janeth, the owner of a beauty salon.  She also sells beauty products by catalogue and is very meticulous and responsible, the reason for which she was elected president.

She plans to use the loan to buy beauty salon supplies such as shampoo, hair conditioner, hair color, etc. in order to offer better service to her customers.  She is well known for the good work she does.  Janeth hopes to increase her earnings and is grateful to the institution for the support she has received.

loans.use: To buy beauty salon supplies such as shampoo and hair conditioner

loans.name: Aidee

texts.es:
Con su credikiva Aidee compró ropa, jeans, calzado y otras mercancías para la venta así como también compró insumos para la preparación de los sancochos;  en la actualidad está solicitando su segundo financiamiento por esta misma línea de crédito y comprará más mercancías porque se acerca el día de la madre y con ello se incrementan las compras de productos y mercancías dirigidas a la mujer como perfumes, electrodomésticos menores, calzado y ropa femenina ; Su meta es continuar  recibiendo la ayuda de las instituciones financieras,  y lograr que sus hijos terminan sus estudios , estas son las palabras que envía Aidee a su financiadores de Kiva:  “Que Dios los siga bendiciendo yu que sigan con esta actividad muy linda de apoyar a muchos microempresarios”
Si usted quiere conocer la historia de Aidee ingrese al siguiente enlace:
texts.en:
Aidee used her past CrediKiva loan to buy clothing, jeans, shoes and other merchandise to sell.  She also bought ingredients to make sancochos.

Now she is requesting a second loan to buy goods for Mother's Day which approaching.  She wants to buy women's products such as perfumes, small electric appliances, shoes and clothing.  Her goal is to continue receiving support from financial institutions and help her children finish their education.

Aidee sends these words to Kiva lenders:  "God bless you and please keep up with this beautiful way of helping so many micro-businesspeople."

loans.use: To buy women's products such as perfumes, small electric appliances, shoes and clothing

loans.name: Bordadoras De Tete Group

texts.es:
Este grupo se llama Bordadoras de Tete porque todas sus integrantes se dedican al bordado de servilletas y manteles, una actividad muy conocida por estas regiones el cual se realiza con la técnica de telar de cintura. Las integrantes de este grupo son personas de raza indígena muy trabajadoras que trabajan día con día para el sustento de su familia.
La representante de este grupo es la señora Estela quien esta casada con el señor Fidencio tiene 3 hijos 1 estudia la primaria y los otros 2 aun no estudian. Estela solicito el préstamo para poder comprar hilos para la elaboración de servilletas y manteles, ella desde muy pequeña aprendió esta actividad y la ventas de estos productos han sido el apoyo económico para su familia. Sus productos los vende en su comunidad y en comunidades cercanas. De las ventas que realiza y de las ganancias que obtiene es para comprarles alimentos  a sus hijos y todo lo que necesita.
Todas la integrantes dan las gracias a FRAC y KIVA por apoyarlas y nos comentan que su sueño es que sus productos sean reconocidos a nivel internacional ya que son prendas muy hermosas que son elaboradas con mucho esfuerzo y amor.
texts.en:
This group is called "Bordadoras de Tete" (Tete Embroiderers) because all of its members make embroidered tablecloths and napkins.  This activity is well-known in the region as it is a technique used to weave waistbands.  The members of the group are very hard-working native indians who work every day to maintain their families.

The representative of the group is Mrs. Estela who is married to Mr. Fidencio.  They have three children, one who in grade school and two who are not school-age yet.  Estela plans to use the loan to buy thread to make tablecloths and napkins.  She learned the skill when she was very young and sells her products in the local and nearby communities to help support her family.  

The earnings from her sales go toward feeding her children and buying them everything they need.

All of the members are grateful to FRAC and KIVA for this support.  Their goal is to make their products known internationally since the linens are beautiful crafts made with much effort and love.

loans.use: To buy white thread and colored yarn to make tablecloths and napkins

loans.name: Serapio

texts.es:
El señor Serapio es un hombre muy trabajador que cuenta con su negocio de polarizado de autos desde hace 12 años ubicándose en el estacionamiento de una tienda departamental muy conocida en la ciudad.
En este momento se ve en la necedad de pedir un préstamo para pagar las escrituras de su casa, y a que el papeleo que tienen que realizar le sale a un bajo precio por lo que no quiere desaprovechar la oportunidad ya que hace tiempo por motivos ajenos a el, no pudo escriturarlo. Serapio necesita capital para poder arreglar este problema y así tener todo en regla.
texts.en:
Serapio is a very hardworking man who has had a polarized auto glass business for 12 years located in the parking lot of a department store that is very well known in the city.  

At this time, he needs to ask for a loan to pay for the deeds to his house. The paperwork that needs to be done is available at a low price and he wants to take advantage of the opportunity since some time ago, for reasons beyond his control, he couldn't get the deed. Serapio needs the money to be able to fix this problem and have everything in order.

loans.use: to pay for the deeds on his land.

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: La Central Group

texts.es:
La señora Teresita de Jesús E. García, es casada y vive en coapilla Estado de Chiapas México, tiene a su  responsabilidad a cuatro hijos: Víctor Manuel diecinueve años, Lázaro de dieciseis,  Marisa del Rosario de quince años, y Luis Antonio de doce.
    El préstamo que solicito lo invertirá lo invertirá en la compra de cosmenticos de la marca avon, para luego  venderlo en la misma localidad, en esta actividad lleva ocho meses y nos  comenta que le va bien ya que con ellos se ha estado apoyando con sus ingresos de su hogar.
    En esta actividad se inspiro para comenzar a trabajar, en algo que se pueda apoyar y que  le deje ingresos,  así  sostener su hogar junto con su esposo que trabaja en el campo para darles lo más necesario a tener lo más necesario.
   Su  más grande ilusión es tener su propia actividad, para salir adelante y sus hijos sigan estudiando una carrera.
    Así también integran al grupo la señora: María Lucita Rodríguez C., quien se dedica a la venta de pollos aliñados (destazados) y la señora  Sofía Vázquez Rodríguez, quien  compra y vende pollos de rancho para luego venderlo en la misma localidad.
texts.en:
Mrs. Teresita de Jesús E. García is married and lives in Coapilla, state of Chiapas, México. She is raising her four children: Víctor Manuel, nineteen, Lázaro, sixteen, Marisa del Rosario, fifteen, and Luis Antonio, twelve. 

The loan she asked for she will invest in buying Avon brand cosmetics to later sell them in the same area. She has done this activity for eight months and she tells us that it is going well for her, since with it she has been supporting her home with the income.   

She was inspired by this business to start working in something she can support her self with and have income. She supports her home along with her husband, who works in the fields. They are able to have what they need the most.     

Her biggest dream is to have her own activity, to get ahead, and for her children to continue studying. Also in the group are: María Lucita Rodríguez C., who sells seasoned chicken (in pieces) and Sofía Vázquez Rodríguez, who buys and sells farm chickens in the area.

loans.use: to pay for the purchase of cosmetics via catalog and later sell them in the same area.

loans.name: Norberta Veronica

texts.es: Norberta Veronica es una mujer muy trabajadora, desde hace varios años tuvo que quedarse sola ya que  su esposo tuvo que emigrar a los Estados Unidos para traer mayores ingresos a su familia. A Norberta se le esta presenta una oportunidad la cual no quiere desaprovechar, en la colonia donde ella vive la mayoría de la gente no ha escriturado su casa por que los papeleos salen muy caros, lo cual una oficina de la localidad esta ofreciendo mejores precios para que estas familias tengan todo en regla. La señora Norberta necesita capital para pagar las escrituras de su casa ya que es su único patrimonio que les ofrecerá a sus tres pequeños hijos.
texts.en: Norberta Veronica is a very hard-working woman.  For several years, she has been living alone as her husband had to emigrate to the United States so that he could make more money for their family.  Norberta currently has an opportunity that she doesn't want to miss out on.  In the residential development where she lives, most people haven't registered their houses because the paperwork is really expensive.  A local office is offering better prices so that these families can have everything in order.  Norberta needs capital to pay to have her house formally registered since it is her only asset which she has to offer her three young children.

loans.use: to pay to formally register her house

loans.name: Jose Rufino

texts.es:
José, reside en San Rafael Oriente departamento de San Miguel, vive con su esposa y dos hijos de 6 y 2 años de edad, él se dedica al cultivo de maíz y frijol, tiene 15 años de experiencia, trabaja todos los días y aprendió esta labor por medio de su padre.
Está en proceso de comprar lo necesario para la siembra y solicita un préstamo para adquirir abono y fertilizantes, dicha compra ayudara a tener los insumos necesarios y poder llevar a cabo la siembra de maíz.
José le gusta mucho su trabajo pues lleva mucho tiempo dedicándose a ello, esta labor la ha ayudado a mantener a su familia y cubrir sus necesidades.
texts.en:
José lives in San Rafael Oriente, in the San Miguel department, with his wife and two children ages 6 and 2. He cultivates corn and beans, and has 15 years of experience. He works every day and learned this work from his father. 

He is in the process of buying the necessary items for sowing, and is requesting a loan for the purchase of manure and fertilizers. This purchase will help him to have the necessary income in order to go through with sowing corn.

Jose enjoys his work greatly, as he has done this for quite some time. This work has helped him to maintain his family and provide for their needs.

loans.use: to purchase manure and fertilizers.

location.town: San Rafael de Oriente, San Miguel

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase cleaning products.

loans.name: Nuevas Amigas De Mercedes Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “NUEVAS AMIGAS DE MERCEDES” iniciará su primer ciclo  en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal de Cascada, está compuesta por nueve integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva encabezada por la señora Claudina. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos tenemos: Importación de relojes, costura de ropa, ayudante de albañil, artesanía en algodón, venta de CD’s, inicio de negocio, Tejido de máquinas, venta de chamarras.

La señora Claudina,  indica que es la primera ves que integra una asociación comunal en Pro Mujer, ingresando por invitación de los promotores. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio venta de chatarra que viene realizando hace un año atrás; este negocio lo aprendió de su amiga.

El crédito que ahora sacará es para la compra de chatarra (que servirá para incrementar su capital), posteriormente lo venderá en su casa, todos los días de 8:00 a 18:00. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar en lo posible a su familia, pues ella vive en unión libre y tiene seis hijos.

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta la salud.
texts.en:
The “NUEVAS AMIGAS DE MERCEDES” (Mercedes' New Friends) community bank is starting its first loan cycle with Pro Mujer, as part of the Cascada regional office.  The group has nine members and is run by a board of directors which is led by Claudina.  The businesses that the group's members carry out are varied and include: importing watches, sewing clothes, working as an assistant builder, making cotton handicrafts, selling CDs, starting up a new business, machine knitting and selling jackets.

Claudina tells us that this is the first time that she has been part of one of Pro Mujer's community banks.  She joined through an invitation from the promoters.  Claudina currently has a business selling scrap metal which she has had for one year.  She learned the business from her friend.

The loan that Claudina is currently taking out will be used to buy scrap metal (which will increase her capital).  She will then sell the scrap from her home every day from 8.00am to 6.00pm.  This work allows Claudina to make money to support her family as best she can.  She lives with her partner and has six children.

When we asked her what she likes about Pro Mujer, she replied that she likes the health services.

loans.use: to buy scrap metal

loans.name: Campo Verde Group

texts.es:
La señora Antonia G. patricia, vive en Coapilla estado de Chiapas México,  fue casada en  donde procreo dos hijos quienes ya están casados y son futuros padres.
      Ella solicito el préstamo para invertirlo en la compra de ingredientes para elaborar tostada y tamales para luego venderlo en la  misma localidad, en esta actividad lleva  cinco años y seis meses el cual nos comenta que le va bien ya que con ello a sacado adelante a su familia.
     Se dedica a esta actividad para poder  tener su propio dinero y así tener para cubrir sus gastos que se generan en su hogar, ya que es una mujer sola que solo depende de ella  y desea  lo mejor para su bien estar.
    Su más grande deseo es que su trabajo valla aumentando para así poder salir adelante así aun que sola quiere lo mejor.
    Las personas las dos integrantes mas son: Rosaura M. S., quien se dedica a vender cosméticos por catalogo y Amelia P. T., compra y vende tortilla en la misma región.
texts.en:
Patricia Antonia G. lives in Coapilla, in the State of Chiapas, Mexico.  She was married and had two children who are now married themselves and future parents.

Patricia requested this loan to invest in buying ingredients for making tostadas and tamales which she will sell in her town.  She has been in this business for five years and six months.  She tells us that her business is doing well and, through it, she has managed to get her family ahead.

Patricia carries out her business in order to have her own money so that she can cover her household expenses since she is a woman who lives alone and only has herself to depend on.  She would like to look after her own well-being as best she can.

Patricia's biggest wish is for her business to increase so that she can get ahead in life.

The other two members of the group are Rosaura M. S. who sells cosmetics through a catalog and Amelia Ptricio T. who buys and sells tortillas in the same region.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for making tostadas and tamales

loans.name: Flor De Pachawacan Group

texts.es: Irma T. A., tiene 26 años D. edad,  no tuvo la oportunidad D. estudiar, tiene 4 hijos y 3 D. los cuales estan estudiando, se dedica a oficios doméstico, y tambièn a la tejeduría, trabajo que viene realizando desD. hace 8 años, inició elaborando pequeños tejidos y ahora teje chamarras, cuenta con el apoyo D. su conyugue quien es comerciante. DeciD. organizar un grupo para poder solicitar un préstamo que le servirá para invertirlo como capital D. trabajo, para la compra D. materia prima: Hilo y lana lo cual es un material muy importante para la elaboración D. chamarras. Las integrantes D. este grupo también se dedican a diferentes actividades productivas como: venta D. mercería, crianza D. animales, venta D. flores, y la elaboración D. candelas. Esperan ver su negocio mejor y mas granD..
texts.en:
Irma T. A. is 26 years old.  She didn't have the opportunity to attend school.  She has four children and three of them are in school.

Irma does house work and also knits.  She has been doing this for eight years.  She started out making small knitted items and now she knits jackets.  She has the support of her husband who is a salesman.  Irma decided to organize this group in order to request a loan which she could invest in her business as working capital, buying raw materials: thread and yarn.  These are very important materials for making her jackets.

The other members of this group work in a variety of businesses including: selling sewing supplies, raising animals, selling flowers and making candles.  They are all hoping to improve and grow their businesses.

loans.use: to buy material for making jackets

loans.name: Francisco Javier

texts.es:
Francisco, reside en Concepción Batres departamento de Usulután, se dedica al cultivo agrícola de maíz y pipián, él vive con sus padres y su esposa, trabaja desde hace 10 años y aprendió el oficio por su padre, todos los días atiende las actividades necesarias para cuido y mantenimiento de la tierra.
Él necesita un préstamo para la compra de insumos agrícolas, abono y fertilizantes, este préstamo le ayudara para tener lo necesario para realizar el cultivo y obtener posiblemente una buena cosecha.
Su objetivo es mantener un trabajo honrrado del cual pueda recibir ingresos para solventar las necesidades del hogar.
texts.en:
Francisco lives in Concepción Batres in the Usulután department. He cultivates corn and squash. He lives with his parents and his wife. He has done this work for 10 years and learned the job from his father. Every day he does the necessary care and maintenance activities for his land.

He needs a loan for the purchase of agricultural tools, manure and fertilizers. This loan will help him to have everything necessary for cultivation and to possibly have a good harvest.

His goal is to maintain a respectable job from which he will be able to make an income in order to cover his household costs.

loans.use: to purchase agricultural tools, manure and fertilizer.

loans.name: Herminia

texts.es: La señora Herminia, tiene una tienda  de joyas de plata y de fantasía, aparte realiza sus ventas mediante catálogos, sus clientes potenciales son empleados de bancos y oficinas publicas, con un pequeño capital ella ofreció ropa y zapatos a esas clientas y le fue muy bien, ahora ella quiere agrandar y diversificar el rubro de su negocio comprando novedades de temporada para darles a sus clientas a facilidades, ya que ella indica que al comprarle la ropa o zapatos, también acomoda las joyas que combinan con los atuendos que vende. Mientras ella realiza su actividad en las oficinas, la tienda se queda a cargo de su hija mayor quien conoce muy bien el manejo del mismo, el sueño de la señora es que su negocio crezca y sea reconocido con el dinero del crédito comprara productos en joyas y en ropa por cantidad, es una persona muy trabajadora agradecida con la institución con el apoyo brindado.
texts.en:
Herminia has a store where she sells silver jewelry and costume jewelry.  She also makes sales through catalogs.  Her potential customers are bank employees and public office workers.  With a small amount of capital, she started selling clothes and shoes to these customers and her business went well.  Now she would like to expand and diversify her business, buying new seasonal products to sell them to her customers.  Herminia tells us that when she is selling clothes or shoes to customers she also sells them jewelry to accompany their outfits.  While Herminia is making her sales in offices, she leaves her eldest daughter in charge of the store.  Her daughter knows how to run the store very well.

Herminia's dream is for her business to grow and become well known.  She will use her loan money to buy jewelry and clothes in bulk.  She is a very hard-working person and is grateful to the institution for the support they have given her.

loans.use: to buy jewelry and clothes

loans.name: Mariana Auxiliadora

texts.es:
En el cantón Rocafuerte se  reúnen cada quince días las socias del Banco Comunal Dulce Amistad. Este lugar se lo conoce por los deliciosos dulces que preparan los lugareños y que son reconocidos en todo el país. Su gente es muy cálida, amable y trabajadora.

La señora Mariana es socia fundadora del Banco comunal, es la tesorera y está muy contenta por la responsabilidad de sus compañeras del grupo.
 
Tiene 62 años de edad, es casada y tiene dos hijos adoptivos que los quiere como propios, el uno ya mayor de edad y una chica de 17 años que estudia en el colegio. Su esposo es agricultor.

Ella es maestra jubilada y ahora se dedica a al comercio, tiene una tienda de comestibles en su casa en la que también vende electrodomésticos y productos de bazar. Trabaja todos los días desde las 7h00 hasta las 20h00 y su hija le ayuda en las ventas. Nos cuenta que lleva con su negocio 12 años.
 
Este crédito es para comprar productos de primera necesidad para surtir su tienda y ciertos artículos de bazar.
 
Sus sueños son seguir trabajando y crecer más en su negocio.
texts.en:
Every two weeks, the members of the Dulce Amistad (Sweet Friendship) community bank meet in Rocafuerte canton.  This place is known for its delicious sweet treats which are prepared by the locals and which are well known throughout the country.  The people are very warm, kind and hard working.

Mariana is a founding member of her community bank.  She is the treasurer and is very happy to have been given this responsibility by her fellow group members.

Mariana is 62 years old, married, and has two adopted children who she loves as if they were her own.  Her son is already grown up and her daughter is 17 and studying in high school.  Her husband is a farmer.

Mariana is a retired school teacher who now works as a saleswoman.  She has a grocery store in her home where she also sells small household appliances and other household items.  She works every day from 7.00am to 8.00pm.  Her daughter helps her to serve her customers.  She tells us that she has been in this business for 12 years.

Mariana will use this loan to buy essential food products to stock her store.  She will also buy certain household items to sell.

Mariana's dreams are to continue working and to grow more in her business.

loans.use: to buy essential food products and other household items

loans.name: Rafael

texts.es: Rafael Pérez M. es un hombre que desea ir mejorando su calidad de vida es por ello que para obtener mas ingresos puso en un negocio de abarrotes en que ofrece calidad y buen precio este es denominado “Abarrotes Alex” que tiene una antigüedad de 4 años al servicio de la comunidad. .Aparte de este ingreso el trabaja por las tardes en un centro comercial en el área de cocina para poder estar pagando su casa que es de interés social y tener su seguro para alguna atención medica. Rafael se ve en la necesidad de comprar mas mercancía para el negocio como lo es botanas, refrescos, comida en lata para tener mayor variedad y así sus ventas se incrementen.
texts.en:
Rafael Pérez M. is a man who wants to improve his standard of living.  This is the reason why, in order to obtain more income, he opened a grocery store where he offers quality and reasonably priced items.  He named his business “Alex’s Groceries”, and has been serving the community for 4 years.

Apart from this income, he works afternoons in a kitchen in the commercial center of the area.  This helps him pay for his house, with is social housing, and for health insurance.  Rafael finds himself needing to buy more merchandise for his business, such as snacks, beverages, and canned foods.  This will allow him to offer a greater variety of products and increase sales.

loans.use: buy merchandise such as snacks, beverages and canned foods for his business.

loans.name: Jose Noe

texts.es:
José, reside en San Rafael Oriente, departamento de San Miguel, vive en compañía de su esposa y tres hijos de 10, 9 y 7 años de edad, él trabaja desde hace 15 años en el cultivo de maíz y frijol, aprendió con su padre todo el proceso de la agricultura.
El solicita un préstamo para la compra de abono y fertilizantes agrícolas, este préstamo le ayudara a que cuente con lo necesario para realizar las labores agrícolas y pueda realizar la siembra de este año, sus riesgos son la intensidad del invierno que puede afectar el crecimiento del maíz. 
Él quiere sacar adelante a su familia, educarlos y puedan tener una carrera universitaria con la cual puedan defenderse en el futuro.
texts.en:
José lives in San Rafael Oriente, in the San Miguel department, with his wife and three children ages 10, 9 and 7. He has worked for 15 years in the cultivation of corn and beans. He learned the entire agricultural process from his father.

He is requesting a loan for the purchase of manure and agricultural fertilizers. This loan will help him to have everything necessary for agricultural labour and to sow this season. The intensity of winter poses a risk that could affect his corn crop.

He wants to get his family ahead and educate them so that they can have a university career with which to provide for themselves in the future.

loans.use: to purchase manure and agricultural fertilizers.

location.town: San Rafael de Oriente, San Miguel

loans.name: Doris Estela

texts.es:
Doris, reside en Usulután, se dedica a la venta de ropa, tiene casa propia donde vive con sus dos hijos, el negocio lo inicio hace 8 meses y lo realiza de forma ambulante, ofreciendo sus productos todos los días a los clientes.
Ella solicita un préstamo para comprar ropa nueva de diferentes estilos y colores, su objetivo es ofrecer a los clientes una mayor variedad donde puedan encontrar lo necesario para vestirse.
Su sueño es tener un local propio y fijo para ofrecer la mercadería, ya que actualmente debe desplazarse a varios lugares buscando clientes.
texts.en:
Doris lives in Usulután, where she dedicates herself to selling clothing.  She has her own house, where she lives with her two children.  She started the business 8 months ago.  She sells her products as a street vendor, offering items to her customers every day.

She requests this loan to buy new clothing of different styles and colors.  Her goal is to offer her customers a greater variety of items, so they can find what they need.  Her dream is to have her own fixed location from which to offer her merchandise, as she currently has to travel to various places looking for customers.

loans.use: buy new clothing of different styles and colors.

loans.name: Oscar Armando

texts.es:
Oscar, reside en Jiquilisco, departamento de Usulután, vive con su esposa y su hija de 3 años de edad, él se dedica a una panadería, la cual inicio hace 5 años, aprendió trabajando como panificador y luego decidió instalar su propia panadería.
El necesita realizar compras de harina, leña, manteca, azúcar y otros que forman parte de la materia prima, para esto solicita un préstamo que le ayude a realizar la inversión y contar con el material necesario para seguir trabajando y produciendo pan.
Oscar tiene como objetivo invertirle al negocio e ir aumentando la producción de la panadería, así mismo mejorar su condición económica y la de su familia.
texts.en: Oscar lives in Jiquilisco, a town in the departament of Usulután, with his wife and a 3-year old daughter.  He runs a bakery, which he has managed for the past 5 years, having trained as a baker before opening his own business.  Oscar seeks credit for basic ingredients, such as flour, firewood, lard and sugar, to continue the bakery's operations and to grow the business.  He plans to invest in the bakery and increase production, in order to benefit his family.

loans.use: To buy flour, firewood, lard and sugar.

loans.name: Felinda Caridad

texts.es:
En el cantón Rocafuerte se  reúnen cada quince días las socias del Banco Comunal Dulce Amistad. Este lugar se lo conoce por los deliciosos dulces que preparan los lugareños y que son reconocidos en todo el país. Su gente es muy cálida, amable y trabajadora.

La señora Felinda es socia fundadora del Banco comunal, esta hace 8 ciclos  y le gusta porque se lleva muy bien con sus compañeras del grupo.
 
Tiene 64 años, está casada y de esta relación tiene tres hijos mayores de edad e independientes. Su esposo es agricultor y ganadero.

Ella tiene un restaurant en un sitio muy turístico que se llama Las Jaguas en Rocafuerte, este lugar está atravesado por el Rio Portoviejo lo cual es muy atractivo  para los visitantes, ya que aquí aprovechan para bañarse y pasar un lindo dia en unión de sus familias. Trabaja los días sabados y domingos, ofrece una gran variedad de platos sobretodo los platos típicos de la provincia, nos cuenta que lleva con su negocio cinco años y que a pesar de que al principio el local se le incendio ella no se hecho para atrás sino que continuo con su negocio.

Este crédito es para comprar unas sillas y mesas ya que las que tiene están muy deterioradas.

Su sueño es tener un restaurant más elegante.
texts.en:
The members of the community bank Sweet Friendship (Dulce Amistad) meet every two weeks in the canton of Rocafuerte.  This location is known for the delicious sweets prepared by the locals, which are recognized throughout the country. The people are very warm, friendly and hardworking.

Mrs. Felinda is a founding member of the community bank and this is her eighth loan cycle.  She likes being a member because she gets along well with her fellow group members.
 
She is 64 years old and married, with three independent, adult children from the marriage. Her husband is a farmer and rancher.

She has a restaurant in a location popular with tourists called The Jaguars of Rocafuerte.  It is crossed by the Rio Portoviejo, which is very attractive to visitors who take the opportunity to swim and have a nice day together with their families. She works on Saturdays and Sundays and offers a wide variety of dishes, especially the typical dishes of the province.  She says that she has had her business for five years and even though there was a fire in the restaurant when it first opened, she continues with her business.

This loan is to buy some chairs and tables, since the ones she has are severely damaged.

Her dream is to have a more elegant restaurant.

loans.use: purchase tables and chairs

loans.name: Andres Luis

texts.es: El Sr. Andrés de 39 años, vive en el Barrio Santa Rosa, vive con su esposa y sus tres hijos que se encuentran en edad escolar. Su actividad económica es el alquiler de sistema de luces y sonido a la cual se dedica desde hace 12 años Alquila para distintos acontecimientos, también cuenta con una actividad secundaria  como auxiliar contable. Su esposa trabaja como jefe de ventas en una empresa muy conocida de la ciudad de Santa Cruz,  así mismo ayudando con los gastos del hogar. El crédito que se le otorgo para la compra de una computadora, el cliente quedo muy agradecido con la institución por  brindarle crédito.
texts.en:
Andrew is 39 years old and lives in the Barrio Santa Rosa with his wife and three children, who are school age. His business is the rental of sound and lighting systems for various events and he has been involved in this business for the past 12 years. He also has a secondary activity as an assistant accountant.

His wife works as a sales manager in a well known company in the city of Santa Cruz, also helping with household expenses. The loan was granted for the purchase of a computer.   He is very grateful to the institution for providing credit.

loans.use: purchase a computer

loans.name: Ricardo

texts.es:
Ricardo tiene la edad de 53 años, con su propio negocio de lubricantes, el cual tiene 6 años de haber establecido su negocio, el cual inicio con ahorros de su trabajo anterior, ocupando parte de su vivienda para ampliar su venta de lubricante y todo para vehículo.
Su esposa lo apoya y sus dos hijos con el negocio. Lo que quiere hacer es mejorar la infraestructura del negocio repellar paredes, embaldosar y comprar puertas, logrando una mejor imagen, que ayude a atraer clientes. Todo esto lo hará mediante el préstamo que Afodenic está otorgando por medio del financiamiento, el cual es de mucho beneficio en su negocio.
texts.en:
Ricardo is 53 years old and he runs his own lubricants shop. He opened it 6 years ago, something he was able to do thanks to his saving form his previous job. His lubricants and car accessories shop occupies a part of his house.
His wife and their two children help him with the shop. What he wants to do is to improve the infrastructure of his shop buy whitewashing and tiling the walls, and by buying doors, thus getting a better look that will help him attract customers. He will achieve this goal thanks to the loan that Afodenic is being granting through the funding, which is a great benefit for his shop.

loans.use: To buy materials to whitewash and tile the walls of his shop and to buy doors in order to improve the look of his shop.

loans.name: Luis Ramon

texts.es:
Luis, reside en Usulután, es agricultor en pequeño, cultiva maíz y hortalizas, vive en casa propia con su familia y sus dos hijos de 30 y 28 años de edad, tiene dos años de estar trabajando en los cultivos.
Él está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de insumos agrícolas como abonos y fertilizantes, estos son muy necesarios y no deben faltar en el proceso de la siembra, ya que son los que permiten el crecimiento sano y el desarrollo de la cosecha.
Su objetivo es recibir una buena cosecha, para comercializarla y generar para su familia ingresos que cubran las principales necesidades.
texts.en: Luis lives in Usulután.  He works farming corn and vegetables.  He lives in his own home with his family and his two children who are 30 and 28 years old.  He has worked as a farmer for two years.  He is asking for a loan ton buy fertilizers that are very necessary as he plants his crops as they allow for the healthy growth and development of his crops.  His objective is to raise a good crop to sell it and earn enough to provide for his family's basic needs.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer

loans.name: Fernando Ernesto

texts.es: Fernando Ernesto se dedica al destace de res y venta de carne, lo inicia una vez que no tiene un trabajo estable que pueda generar ingresos para su hogar. Él cuenta que siempre le ha gustado trabajar y ser una persona muy independiente. El crédito que está solicitando es para la compra de carne y así ofrecer lomo, hígado, hueso entre otros. Fernando quiere cumplir sus metas una de ellas es que sus hijos logren finalizar sus estudios, también quiere que su negocio logre salir adelante con su medio de vida.
texts.en: Fernando Ernesto engages in beef butchering and meat sale. He started this activity when he found himself without a fixed job that could grant earnings for his family. He says he has always liked working and being an independent person. He will use the loan he is requesting to buy meat and to sell loin, liver and bones among other parts. Fernando wishes to achieve all of his goals, two of which are helping his children finishing their studies and succeeding in making his shop grow together with his standard of living.

loans.use: To buy meat and to sell loin, liver and bones among other parts.

loans.name: Jeffrey A.

texts.en:
Jeffrey L. owns NuVision Properties LLC, a real estate management company.  He and his wife entered the real estate business in February 2008, during the middle of the housing crisis. With real estate affordable, they jumped at the opportunity to build long-term financial stability.  Initially, they bought and sold foreclosed houses, but subsequently they moved into apartment management because of its efficiency (more tenants in one location) and financial stability.  They currently own one apartment building, and their goal for 2011 is to acquire two additional apartment buildings, each with a capacity of twenty-four or more units.  If they succeed, Jeffrey’s wife will begin managing the properties full-time at the beginning of 2012. 

 Jeffrey and his wife balance expanding NuVision Properties with their full-time careers.  Jeffrey works with a software engineering company, and his wife is a director for an outpatient medical center.  Jeffrey says that he and his wife manage their workload by working long hours and “burning the midnight oil.” He handles the finances and looks for prospective deals, and his wife manages the apartment building. 

With this loan, Jeffrey and his wife are implementing a mail-out marketing campaign that will promote their business to real estate agencies, as well as to prospective apartment complex owners looking to sell.  This campaign will focus on New Orleans, Baton Rouge, and select markets around Louisiana and adjoining states.  This loan also helps them build their business credit, which will help them receive financing for later acquisitions.

loans.use: to pay for marketing campaign.

loans.name: Judith Isilma

texts.es:
Judith, vive con su esposo y tres hijos D. 6, 5 y 8 años D. edad, residen en la ciudad D. San Miguel, administra una panadería en la cual trabaja con su esposo, todos los días ya que deben proveer a los vendedores D. ruta, para hacer llegar su pan hasta los pueblos D. los alrededores.
Ella actualmente necesita un préstamo para la compra D. harina, manteca, azúcar, esta compra la pretenD. hacer por cantidades grandes, permitiéndole almacenar para cierto tiempo estos materiales y en un futuro disminuir los costos.
Para Judith su principal sueño es ampliarse hasta administrar dos panaderías, para bastecer a más personas y crecer como microempresaria.
texts.en:
Judith lives in the city of San Miguel together with her husband and her three children, aged six, five, and eight. Judith runs a bakery where she and her husband work everyday to prepare the bread and supply it to traveling vendors who then deliver it to nearby towns.

Currently Judith is seeking a loan to purchase flour, butter, and sugar; she wants to buy these items in large quantities which would allow her to have a supply of these raw materials and also to decrease future costs. Judith's dream is expand her business and have two bakeries so that should could proviD. bread to more people and grow as a micro-entrepreneur.

loans.use: to purchase flour, butter, and sugar

loans.name: Nieve Moncerrate

texts.es:
En el cantón Rocafuerte se  reúnen cada quince días las socias del Banco Comunal Dulce Amistad. Este lugar se lo conoce por los deliciosos dulces que preparan los lugareños y que son reconocidos en todo el país. Su gente es muy cálida, amable y trabajadora.

En este lugar conocimos a la señora Nieve, tiene 52 años, es viuda y de esta relación tiene tres hijos, dos mayores de edad y uno de 17 años que estudia en colegio y es el que aun vive con ella.
 
Ella es una madre muy abnegada y luchadora que para sacar a sus hijos adelante se dedica a la venta de ropa de todo tipo, su forma de venta es puerta a puerta y también vende en su  casa donde tiene un pequeño local.  Compra su mercadería en Guayaquil a donde viaja cada quince días. Trabaja en las mañanas de lunes a domingo, ella  deja a crédito a sus clientes  y cobra cada quince días. Nos cuenta que tiene este negocio 15 años y que gracias a él ha sacado adelante  a su familia.

Este crédito lo va emplear en comprar más mercadería como: pantalones, blusas, camisetas y ropa de niños. Está en el Banco Comunal hace 5 ciclos y le gusta por que el grupo que es muy unido. 

Su sueño  es tener un almacén donde pueda vender sus productos.
texts.en:
The members of the community bank Sweet Friendship (Dulce Amistad) meet every two weeks in the canton of Rocafuerte. This location is known for the delicious sweets prepared by the locals, which are recognized throughout the country. The people are very warm, friendly and hardworking.

Here lives Mrs. Snow, who is 52 years old and a widow with three children from her marriage, two adults and a 17-year-old student in school who is still living with her.
 
She is a very devoted mother and works hard in selling clothing of all types to help her children get ahead.  She sells door to door and also in her house where he has a small shop. She purchases her merchandise in Guayaquil, where she travels every fifteen days. She works in the mornings from Monday to Sunday and provides credit to her customers and makes collections every fifteen days. She indicates that she has had this business for 15 years and it has helped her family get ahead.

She is going to use the loan to buy more merchandise including pants, blouses, shirts and children's clothes. She has been in the community bank for 5 loan cycles and likes her group because it is very united.

His dream is to have a store where she can sell their products.

loans.use: buy more merchandise including pants, blouses, shirts and children's clothes.

loans.name: Orfilia De La Paz

texts.es:
Orfilia, resiD. en San Miguel, vive junto a un hijo, administra una tienda, la cual fue fundada por iniciativa propia hace 15 años, la atienD. todos los días D. 6:00am a 7:00pm, hasta el momento no ha tenido dificultad en la atención a los clientes y por lo mismo desea invertir un préstamo en mercadería.
Su compra específicamente será en arroz, azúcar, aceite, frijoles y detergentes, estos materiales son necesarios para ofrecer a los clientes ya que a diario frecuentan la tienda y los solicitan, el préstamo ayudara a fortalecer el negocio y a mejorar las ventas.
Para Orfilia la buena administración D. la tienda es su objetivo, ya que D. ella recibe las ganancias necesarias para cubrir las demandas D. su familia.
texts.en:
Orfilia lives in San Miguel together with her son.  She runs a store which she set up on her own initiative 15 years ago.  She serves in her store every day from 6.00am to 7.00pm.  She hasn't had any problems serving her customers and would like to invest a loan in buying merchandise.

In particular, Orfilia will buy rice, sugar, oil, beans and detergents.  She needs these products to offer her customers as they come to her store every day and request them.  This loan will help her to strengthen her business and improve her sales.

Orfilia's goal is to run her store well since it makes her the money she needs to cover her family's expenses.

loans.use: to buy rice, sugar, oil, beans and detergents

loans.name: Johana María

texts.es:
En el cantón Rocafuerte se  reúnen cada quince días las socias del Banco Comunal Dulce Amistad. Este lugar se lo conoce por los deliciosos dulces que preparan los lugareños y que son reconocidos en todo el país. Su gente es muy cálida, amable y trabajadora.

En este lugar conocimos a la señora Johana, tiene 30  años, está casada y de esta relación tiene un hijo de 11 años de edad que estudia en colegio. Su esposo es comerciante. Está en el Banco Comunal desde hace tres ciclos y le gusta porque el banco le ha ayudado a comprar ciertas cosas necesarias en su negocio.

Ella tiene un salón de belleza en el cual  realiza diversos trabajos como: tinturados, cortes de cabellos, pintado de uñas y otros. Trabaja desde las 8h00 hasta las 21h00 y a veces hasta más tarde si sus clientes requieren de sus servicios.  También vende ropa de todo tipo en su local ya que allí tiene vitrinas para mostrar sus prendas, nos dice que tiene su salón de belleza 17 años, que le ha ido muy bien y que poco a poco la ha ido creciendo.
  
Este crédito lo va a emplear para comprar tintes de cabello, permanentes y ropa de todo tipo.
 
Sus sueños son tener salud y que nunca le falte trabajo.
texts.en:
The members of the community bank Sweet Friendship (Dulce Amistad) meet every two weeks in the canton of Rocafuerte. This location is known for the delicious sweets prepared by the locals, which are recognized throughout the country. The people are very warm, friendly and hardworking.

Mrs. Johanna lives here and is 30 years old, married with a son age 11 from this relationship, who attends school. Her husband is a merchant.  She has been in the community bank for three loan cycles and likes it because the bank has helped her to purchase items required in her business.

She has a beauty salon, where she performs various jobs such as dyeing, cutting hair, painting nails and others. She works from 8:00AM to 9:00PM and sometimes even later if customers require her services. She also sells clothing of all types in her shop and has windows to display these clothes.   She communicated that her beauty salon is 17 years old.  The business has performed very well and has grown gradually.
  
She is going to use this loan to buy hair dye, supplies for permanents and clothing of all kinds.
 
Her dreams are to have good health and never be left without work.

loans.use: buy hair dye, supplies for permanents and clothing of all kinds

loans.name: Mirtha Sonia

texts.es: La Sra. Mirtha  cliente vive en casa propia se dedica a la venta de verduras y hortalizas su esposo la dejó cuando tuvo su último hijo por problemas que tubieron esto fue un golpe para ella pero ahora salio adelante, vende en el mercado Calatayud en el puesto de su abuela tiene 2 hijos actualmente se hace cargo de su abuela que tiene diabetes y se encuentra en cama, su trabajo es muy sacrificado tiene que comprar las verduras a primeras horas de día. Y luego llevar esta a su puesto para comerciarlo, a medio día tiene que ir a su domicilio para dar comida a sus hijos y a su abuela, la señora vive en una zona alejada de la ciudad y de su puesto de venta, con el dinero del crédito comprara verduras por mayor, es una persona muy trabajadora agradecida con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en:
Ms. Mirtha lives in her own house and works selling vegetables.  Her husband left her after she had her last child and this was a blow for her,  but she is now getting ahead.  She sells in the market in Calatayud at her grandmother's stall.  She has 2 children and currently takes care of her grandmother who has diabetes and is in bed.

She works very hard, since she has to buy vegetables in the early hours of the day and then bring them to her stall in the market for sale.  At noon she has to return home to prepare food for her children and grandmother. She lives in a remote area of the city away from her market.  

With money from the loan she will buy wholesale vegetables.  She is a very hardworking person and is grateful to the institution for their support.

loans.use: purchase vegetables for her business

loans.name: Daniel

texts.es: El señor Daniel se dedica a brindar servicios D. comida buffet para acontecimientos especiales, es D. profesión gastrónomo, se dedica a esta actividad hace 2 años, viven en casa D. sus padres y es soltero,   el crédito que solicita es para la compra D. utensilios para la atención D. servicios D. buffet indica que es muy importante este crédito por que así consolidará su negocio que esta teniendo bastante demanda en el mercado y D. esta forma quiere sustentar su manutención D. el y D. su familia, es un joven emprendedor y con ganas D. superación, su deseo es ser muy conocido por el buen servicio que brinda a sus clientes, así poder tener mayores ingreso y mejorar la calidad D. vida D. toda su familia, esta agradecido con la institución por el apoyo brindado en la otorgación del crédito.
texts.en: Daniel works offering a buffet catering service for special occasions. He is a gourmet by profession and has worked in this field for 2 years. He lives in his parents' home and he is single. The loan he is asking for is to buy serving utensils for the buffet service. He indicates that this loan is very important because in this way he can consolidate his business, which is much in demand in the market. He would like to stablilize his own support and that of his family. He is an enterprising young man who wants to get ahead. He wants to become very well known for the good service he gives his customers as well as to have more income and a better quality of life for his family. He is grateful to the institution for the support it has offered in making this loan.

loans.use: to buy utensils for his business.

loans.name: Veronica

texts.es: La señora Verónica es una mujer muy responsable que labora en una maquiladora como operadora para el sostén de la familia, su hijo vive con ella por lo que la apoya económicamente. Con ahorros inicio la construcción de su cocina en la parte de atrás de su casa para tener mayor comodidad ya que su casa es muy pequeña y los cuartos son muy estrechos. Para terminar su proyecto necesita comprar material y pagar mano de obra.
texts.en: Verónica is a very responsible woman working for a "maquiladora" (a bonded assembly plant set up by a foreign firm near the US border) to support her family; her son lives with her and helps her economically. Thanks to her savings she started building her kitchen at the back of her house, in order to live more comfortably as her house is very small and the rooms are very narrow really.
